abstract: Even though its second-quarter results disappointed Wall Street, Google insisted it is doing well. Part of the reason for the decline: Google is deliberately reducing the percentage of search pages with ads.
snippet: Even though its second-quarter results disappointed Wall Street, Google insisted it is doing well. Part of the reason for the decline: Google is deliberately reducing the percentage of search pages with ads.
lead_paragraph: Listening to Google’s executives on their conference call with investors Thursday afternoon, you’d never know that the company’s second-quarter results fell short of expectations and its shares plummeted 10 percent in after-hours trading.

headline.main: Google Deliberately Sells Fewer Ads — and May Have Gone Too Far

abstract: The search giant gave an uncharacteristic disappointment to investors on Thursday, failing to meet at least some of Wall Street’s expectations for its second-quarter performance.
snippet: The search giant gave an uncharacteristic disappointment to investors on Thursday, failing to meet at least some of Wall Street’s expectations for its second-quarter performance.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO Google, the search giant, gave an uncharacteristic disappointment to investors on Thursday, failing to meet at least some of Wall Street’s expectations for its second-quarter performance.

headline.main: Google Earnings Are Below Forecasts, and Shares Fall
headline.print_headline: Google Earnings Are Below Forecasts, and Shares Fall

abstract: Google and Microsoft issued quarterly results on Thursday that disappointed investors.
snippet: Google and Microsoft issued quarterly results on Thursday that disappointed investors.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  Like two straight-A students who uncharacteristically fail an exam, the technology titans Google and Microsoft issued quarterly results on Thursday that disappointed investors.
